definition: to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: The 'softness' or 'hardness' of rubber compounds is varied for each race according to the known characteristics of the track.
sentences.chinese: 根据各赛道不同的特性，轮胎橡胶的硬度也不相同。

sentences.english: McQueen made his way to the track.
Where can I watch Speedway Junky movie online free full stream?
sentences.chinese: 我在哪里可以看电影赛道繁杂的网上免费全速？

sentences.english: You are hoping to cut your lap time between hotel and circuit?
sentences.chinese: 你想要缩短一下酒店到赛道的圈速伐？

sentences.english: I enjoy visiting new racetracks and I'm looking forward to getting into the cockpit on Friday morning.
sentences.chinese: 我很享受新的赛道，我期待着周五早上坐进赛车。

sentences.english: That inaugural Olympic road race was held on the marathon course.
sentences.chinese: 首届奥运会自行车公路赛是在马拉松的赛道上进行的。

sentences.english: It was long considered the single toughest purpose-built racetrack in the world.
sentences.chinese: 这是长期以来公认最难的一条专业赛道。

sentences.english: It’s another purpose built track with some interesting features.
sentences.chinese: 这是另一个特制的赛道，有一些有趣的特色。

sentences.english: The highlight of the day was stopping at Bonneville Salt Flats International Speedway.
sentences.chinese: 最突出的一天是停在巴纳维亚盐带平地国际赛道。

sentences.english: It remains Barrichello's best finish at the track.
sentences.chinese: 也是rubens在这条赛道上的最好战绩。

sentences.english: Daytona is more than a track.
sentences.chinese: 代托纳不仅仅是一条赛道。

sentences.english: The model now has a many-to-one relationship between trails and locations.
sentences.chinese: 模型现在在赛道和地点之间有多对一关系。

sentences.english: The Shanghai International Circuit will be open for practice.
sentences.chinese: 上海国际赛车场开放赛道供驻场车队练习。

sentences.english: A question to you all. Can you give us your impressions of the circuit and Valencia?
sentences.chinese: 你们对瓦伦西亚和这条赛道的印象咋样？

sentences.english: The race was at the 1.5 miler Kentucky Speedway oval.
sentences.chinese: 比赛在单圈一点五哩的肯塔基椭圆形赛道举行。

sentences.english: The primary wings mounted front and rear are fitted with different profiles depending on the downforce requirements of a particular track.
sentences.chinese: 最早的前后翼根据赛道下压力的差别有不同的外形。

definition: time trial (e.g. in cycle race)/timed race/competition against the clock
to start running/the start of a race
ultramarathon/abbr. for 超級馬拉松|超级马拉松[chao1 ji2 ma3 la1 song1]
